section.title: Viewing Genealogy of an Instance or Image
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine detects the lineage of an instance. View an instance's lineage and compare the instances that are part of its tree. This also allows tagging of instances that share genealogy.

step.para: Click the accordion for the item to view genealogy.
Click on the item to view its Summary.
From the Relationships area in the Summary, click Genealogy.
